thread.section_title: Apex City of London Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely hotel, great location
thread.title_full: Lovely hotel, great location - Review of Apex City of London Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Holly M
title: Lovely hotel, great location
text: It seemed a little expensive but was actually well priced for the standard and location. There were tea and coffee making facilities, shampoo and conditioner, hairdryer and the staff were lovely. I would have preferred breakfast included for the price but no qualms besides that.
